text.section:
For fiscal years 2011 through 2015, the Corps Program shall be funded with:
The amount specified in § 3-302(d) of this article; and
Up to $250,000 in additional funds that may be allocated by the Trust through its annual budget process.
The Trust and the Corps Board shall seek federal funds and grants and donations from private sources to be made to the Trust for the purpose of long-term funding of the Corps Program.
